*[[Blue Flute#Shops|Fallarbor Town Gem Master]] }} == Description == The '''Blue Flute''' is a type of [[Flutes|Flute]]. By using Dark, Ghost, and Ice Gems the Blue Flute increases the player's Dungeon Token Yield. == Details == Blue Flute increases the player's Dungeon Token Yield by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%. Costs a variable amount of Dark, Ghost, and Ice Gems when active, cost based on how many total Flutes are active. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/headâ€Ž|Battle items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Fallarbor_Town_Gem_Master|Fallarbor Town Gem Master]]| 10,000 [[File:Dark_Gem.png|30px]]
